subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Josh Childress scored a season-high 25 points and Zaza Pachulia had 23 to help host Atlanta to a 99-76 victory against the Sacramento Kings, the Hawks’ largest win of the season.
snippet: Josh Childress scored a season-high 25 points and Zaza Pachulia had 23 to help host Atlanta to a 99-76 victory against the Sacramento Kings, the Hawks’ largest win of the season.
